name: Corn Maize
description:
Submission for October Game Jam 2020.  Navigate through a randomly generated maze and collect keys to unlock the exit to the maze. all while avoiding being caught by the enemies. 

Created by: 

Jonathan Gonzales- jsg170000

Rachel Wen- rxw180000

Aaron Thompson- aat170830

Instructions:

WASD - Move

SpaceBar - Sprint

E - Open Door

Cheat Code:  If you want to delete your best times. go to the Main Menu and Input a,s,d,f,g.
